title: Text Summarization Skill Enhancement Simulation Training in Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of text analysis and summarization, experience with LMS systems
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate the ability to efficiently extract and summarize core concepts from mathematical text; training in VR environments simulates real-world workplace scenarios (e.g., report writing, research analysis).

learning_goals: Learners can accurately restructure math-related texts into summaries compressed by over 30%.
Learners can critically evaluate and improve the outcomes of summary tools (including AI-assisted ones).
Learners can apply effective summarization strategies under time constraints (within 10 minutes) in work simulation environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
